column5: Taking an advanced nursing course is a real investment in your career. We have excellent links with local NHS trusts and many of our graduates find they achieve promotion during or soon after their course.Our programme has been carefully designed to advance nursing practice and improve patient care. In clinical practice, applicants for senior and advanced nursing posts are increasingly expected to be working towards masters-level qualifications.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: Full-time: 12 months | Part-time: Up to 48 months
